parameter.name: iteration
parameter.description: Number of times to apply guaussian smoothing to images in-place, default 1

parameter.name: file
parameter.description: The name of the file, including directory and extension, which implies image format

parameter.name: increment
parameter.description: If specified and true, inserts a sequential integer in front of the filename extension

parameter.name: widthAttribute
parameter.description: width of image, in pixels -- default attribute is 'ipl_width'

parameter.name: heightAttribute
parameter.description: height of image, in pixels -- default attribute is 'ipl_depth'

parameter.name: depthAttribute
parameter.description: depth of pixel, per channel, in bits -- default attribute is 'ipl_depth', value must be "8"

parameter.name: channelsAttribute
parameter.description: number of color channels -- default attribute is 'ipl_channels', default value is "3"

parameter.name: dataAttribute
parameter.description: pixel data -- default attribute is 'ipl_data', type must be list<uint8>, size must be width*height*channels

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: cam index to read from, default 0

parameter.name: fps
parameter.description: desired fps, default undefined (use camera queried rate or 20 fps)

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: desired width, default undefined (use camera default)

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: desired height, desired height, default undefined (use camera default)

parameter.name: transform
parameter.description: The CV "in place" function to apply, suitable functions are "cvOr", "cvAnd", "cvAbsDiff", etc.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.description: hostname, default undefined (listening for incoming connections must be set to true)

parameter.name: listen
parameter.description: listen for connections, default false (hostname must be set)

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: port

parameter.name: compress
parameter.description: compress before output, default false

parameter.name: display
parameter.description: which graphical display to use, by default the environment variable $DISPLAY

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: title of display window, default undefined

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: skip n frames between each displayed frame, default 0 (skip none)

parameter.name: widthAttribute
parameter.description: width of image, in pixels -- default attribute is 'ipl_width'

parameter.name: heightAttribute
parameter.description: height of image, in pixels -- default attribute is 'ipl_depth'

parameter.name: depthAttribute
parameter.description: depth of pixel, per channel, in bits -- default attribute is 'ipl_depth', value must be "8"

parameter.name: channelsAttribute
parameter.description: number of color channels -- default attribute is 'ipl_channels', default value is "3"

parameter.name: dataAttribute
parameter.description: pixel data -- default attribute is 'ipl_data', type must be list<uint8>, size must be width*height*channels

parameter.name: threshold_type
parameter.description: Types of thresholding (cv.h) (quoted)

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.description: Specify threshold value if trackbar is not used, default use TrackBar value

parameter.name: max
parameter.description: the maximum value to use with thresholding types

parameter.name: relative
parameter.description: Relative from application start(non-zero) or system time(0), default 0 for system time

primitiveOp.name: CaptureFromURL
primitiveOp.description: Capture video sequence by periodically polling a URL

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: Location of image to poll periodically

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: Image format, default JPG

parameter.name: rate
parameter.description: Rate to poll the url, default 15

parameter.name: dieonerror
parameter.description: Stop polling on error(1) or continue on errors(0), default 1

parameter.name: file
parameter.description: file input (recommend using an absolute path)

parameter.name: rate
parameter.description: desired frame rate, default defined in file

parameter.name: repeat
parameter.description: repeat indefinitely, default false(0)

parameter.name: scale
parameter.description: scale input image before detection (larger values scale down the image and smaller values enlarge, 1.0 for original size), default 1.0

parameter.name: facemodel
parameter.description: facemodel location (recommend using an absolute path)

parameter.name: iteration
parameter.description: number of iterations, default 1

parameter.name: filename
parameter.description: filename of output file

parameter.name: fourcc
parameter.description: Four letter CV_FOURCC corresponding to the desired output codec

parameter.name: rate
parameter.description: output frame rate

parameter.name: frate
parameter.description: set output frame rate equal to frame rate in input file(frate)

primitiveOp.name: AddText
primitiveOp.description: Add text to the image. Location and background/foreground are configurable

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: Text to add to the image

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Font size, default 1.0

parameter.name: thickness
parameter.description: Font thickness, default 1

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Text starting x position from top-left, default 20, negative wraps around

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Text starting y position from top-left, default 20, negative wraps around

parameter.name: forecolor
parameter.description: Text foreground (face) RGB value, singleton or triplet, default 0,0,0

parameter.name: backcolor
parameter.description: Text background (surrounding box) RGB value, singleton or triplet, default undefined

parameter.name: widthAttribute
parameter.description: width of image, in pixels -- default attribute is 'ipl_width'

parameter.name: heightAttribute
parameter.description: height of image, in pixels -- default attribute is 'ipl_depth'

parameter.name: depthAttribute
parameter.description: depth of pixel, per channel, in bits -- default attribute is 'ipl_depth', value must be "8"

parameter.name: channelsAttribute
parameter.description: number of color channels -- default attribute is 'ipl_channels', default value is "3"

parameter.name: dataAttribute
parameter.description: pixel data -- default attribute is 'ipl_data', type must be list<uint8>, size must be width*height*channels

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: circle color singleton or triplet, defaults 0,0,255 (first circle), 0,128,255 (second circle), 0,255,255 (third), 0,255,0 (fourth), 255,128,0 (fifth), 255,255,0 (sixth), 255,0,0 (seventh), 255,0,255 (eighth), repeat pattern for additional default colors

parameter.name: thickness
parameter.description: thickness of circle, default 1

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.description: Threshold to determine if a frame is empty, default 0.05 (i.e. If the average pixel value across the frame is less than 0.05, then it is empty/black)

parameter.name: pyramidlevel
parameter.description: Specify pyramidlevel value if trackbar is not used, default use TrackBar value

parameter.name: termiteration
parameter.description: Specify termiteration value if trackbar is not used, default use TrackBar value

parameter.name: featurecount
parameter.description: Specify featurecount value if trackbar is not used, default use TrackBar value

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.description: threshold, default 1

parameter.name: termeps
parameter.description: termeps, default 0.3

parameter.name: httpport
parameter.description: http port used for output, default use the system default

parameter.name: httplabel
parameter.description: Register HTTP server with label, default undefined

parameter.name: httpport
parameter.description: http port used for output, default use the system default

parameter.name: httplabel
parameter.description: Register HTTP server with label, default undefined

parameter.name: file
parameter.description: Use the frame rate from the file specified, default use rate parameter

parameter.name: rate
parameter.description: Specify the desired output frame rate per second, default use the file parameter

parameter.name: time
parameter.description: Learning time for image background in seconds (longer is better, so long as there are no foreground objects), default 10

parameter.name: banner
parameter.description: Produce an empty frame with the text "learning in progress" for each incoming frame during the learning phase (true-1, false-0), default 0

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: image offset (x,y) from top-left corner of image 1 and top-left corner of image 2 (can be positive or negative), default 0,0

parameter.name: opacity
parameter.description: opacity of the second image 0(invisible) vs. 100 (completely covers), default 100

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.description: hostname, default undefined (listening for incoming connections must be set to true)

parameter.name: listen
parameter.description: listen for connections, default false (hostname must be set)

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: port

parameter.name: banner
parameter.description: Use banner image while waiting for incoming connection, default false

parameter.name: iteration
parameter.description: number of iterations, default 1

parameter.name: display
parameter.description: Graphical Display, typically $DISPLAY

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: title of display window, if attaching to an existing window, the titles must match.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Trackbar name

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Initial trackbar value

parameter.name: max
parameter.description: Maximum trackbar value

parameter.name: radius
parameter.description: filter radius, default 3

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: mode {min, med(ian), max}, default median

parameter.name: invert
parameter.description: invert pixel values prior to log scaling true(1) or false(0), default 0

parameter.name: hull
parameter.description: Smooth edges using convex hull (true-1 or false-0), Default 0 thus polygon approximation used

parameter.name: perim
parameter.description: Perimeter threshold factor, Default 4.0

parameter.name: horizontal
parameter.description: Flip image horizontal, default false

parameter.name: vertical
parameter.description: Flip image vertical, default false

parameter.name: threshold1
parameter.description: Specify threshold1 value for cvCanny if trackbar is not used, default use TrackBar value

parameter.name: threshold2
parameter.description: Specify threshold2 value relative to threshold1 value for cvCanny if trackbar is not used, default use TrackBar value. e.g. if threshold values are (10, 20) then parameters should be (10, 10).

parameter.name: aperture
parameter.description: aperture size for cvCanny, default 3

parameter.name: fps
parameter.description: track fps stat, default true

parameter.name: kbs
parameter.description: track kbs stat, default true

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: track size stat, default true

parameter.name: channels
parameter.description: track channels stat, default true

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: track count stat, default true

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: color singleton or triplet, default white (255)

parameter.name: fps
parameter.description: fps (0 means no delay), default 20

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: width, default 640

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: height, default 480

parameter.name: channels
parameter.description: number of channels, 1 for black/white frames and 3 for RGB frames, default 1

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: solid singleton or triplet color input instead of image input, default black(0)

parameter.name: image
parameter.description: image input instead of solid color, default undefined (use solid color)

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: Number of output frames desired (count), default undefined (unlimited)

parameter.name: topleft
parameter.description: Coordinate pair for location of box top-left corner x,y

parameter.name: bottomright
parameter.description: Coordinate pair for location of box bottom-right corner x,y

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: RGB singleton or triplet color of the box

parameter.name: opacity
parameter.description: Opacity percent of the box[0,100], default 100

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: Width of resized image, cannot be used with 'percent' parameter. If used without 'height' parameter, aspect ratio will be kept

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: Height of resized image, cannot be used with 'percent' parameter. If used without 'width' parameter, aspect ratio will be kept

parameter.name: percent
parameter.description: Percent (Integer) of resizing original image, cannot be used with 'width' or 'height' parameters. Less than 100 will be smaller and greater than 100 will be larger

parameter.name: topleft
parameter.description: top-left point {int,int} of crop box

parameter.name: bottomright
parameter.description: bottom-right point {int,int} of crop box

parameter.name: fps
parameter.description: Number of frames per second to be generated, default 20

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: Width of snow image to be generated, default 640

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: Height of snow image to be generated, default 480

parameter.name: cvt_param
parameter.description: Constants for color conversion (cv.h) (quoted)

parameter.name: channels
parameter.description: Number of channels in the output image (1 or 3), Default 1

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: style ("adaptive" or "fixed")

parameter.name: frame
parameter.description: Number of frames to skip between processing a frame, default 0

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: rectangle color, expressed as a list of integers of the form "[red,green,blue]" in the range of zero to 255, defaulting to [0,0,255] for the first rectange, then , [0,128,255], [0,255,255], [0,255,0], [255,128,0], [255,255,0], [255,0,0], [255,0,255], for subsequent rectanges, repeating as necessary for all rectanges

parameter.name: thickness
parameter.description: thickness of rectangle, default 1

parameter.name: center
parameter.description: center point {int,int} to rotate around, default uses the center of the image

parameter.name: angle
parameter.description: rotation angle in degrees and positive values mean counter-clockwise

parameter.name: scale
parameter.description: isotropic scale factor. Less than 1.0 will be smaller and greater than 1.0 will be larger, default 1.0 (no scaling)

type.name: IplImage
type.type: int32 ipl_channels, int32 ipl_depth, int32 ipl_width, int32 ipl_height, list<uint8> ipl_data, uint64 tag

type.name: BoxList
type.type: list<int32> x_list, list<int32> y_list, list<int32> width_list, list<int32> height_list

type.name: CroppedIplImage
type.type: int32 ipl_channels, int32 ipl_depth, int32 ipl_width, int32 ipl_height, int32 ipl_x, int32 ipl_y, list<uint8> ipl_data, uint64 tag
